wikipedia_page.main: Rowland Griffiths (4 March 1886 – 4 May 1914) was a Wales international rugby union player. He was selected for the 1908 British Lions tour to New Zealand and Australia. Griffiths played club rugby for Newport RFC.

response: * Rowland Griffiths (1886–1914), Wales international rugby union player
